name: Hockey (elementos20)
description:
It is 2D hockey with pixelart graphics, with a simple but not definitive design, for now it is under development and the only mode available is the 2 player mode.

The game includes several styles for the hockey sticks, styles for the field and puck and new game modes will be coming soon.

Apart from being able to change the styles of the hockey sticks you can also decide how many goals you want the game to be.

Player 1 has the AWSD controls and Player 2 has the arrow keys.
